visualization_approach: Morphospace landscape with attractors as terrain features
geometric_elements: nodes (forms), contours (stability basins), peaks (transitions), valleys (stable forms)
common_errors: Depicting forms as static objects rather than regions of attraction; missing stability indication
exemplar_prompt: Morphospace terrain in Cartographic Guild style. Elevated view showing Form Library as landscape. Deep valleys for stable forms (Quintic Cycle, Binary Division). Ridges separating attractor basins. Contour lines at regular stability intervals. Color gradient: deep blue (#2C5282) for stable forms, yellow (#ECC94B) for transitional ridges, red (#C53030) for unstable peaks. Parchment background. Legend showing stability scale.

visualization_approach: Topographic map with basins as catchment areas
geometric_elements: contour lines, basin boundaries, flow arrows, attractor points
common_errors: Confusing basins with individual states; omitting flow direction; using discrete rather than continuous representation
exemplar_prompt: Basin topology in Geometric-Cartographic hybrid style. Topographic view of attractor landscape. Basins as catchment areas with contour lines showing depth. Flow arrows indicate gradient descent toward attractors. Clean uniform lines for precision. Contours: slate (#1A202C), basin fills: blue gradient (#2C5282 to #ECC94B). White background with subtle elevation shading.

geometric_elements: nested boundaries, integration arrows, level labels, formula annotation
common_errors: Treating levels as discrete categories rather than continuous spectrum; missing the integration metaphor
exemplar_prompt: I-C-∫ hierarchy in Notation Scribes style. Nested boundaries showing integration levels: Triggered (outermost), Autonomous, Modular, Emergent (innermost). Integration symbol (∫) connecting levels with arrows. Clean publication-quality lines. Black (#1A202C) boundaries, blue (#2B6CB0) for integration paths, green (#276749) for validated levels. White background. LaTeX-style labels at each level.

geometric_elements: nodes (entities), solid edges (positive), dashed edges (negative), clusters
common_errors: Using spatial proximity instead of edge connections; missing signed relationship indicators; over-clustering
exemplar_prompt: Constellation diagram in Organic-Notation hybrid style. Entities as nodes connected by edges. Solid lines for positive (attraction) relationships, dashed for negative (repulsion). Natural flowing layout with equation annotations. Node colors: forest green (#276749) for stable entities, teal (#319795) for transitional. Variable line weight. Soft gradient background with white label zones.

visualization_approach: Force field visualization with attraction/repulsion vectors
geometric_elements: arrows (force direction), gradient fills (field strength), equilibrium points
common_errors: Static representation missing the dynamic tension; treating all forces as equal strength
exemplar_prompt: Tension field in Organic School style. Force vectors radiating from entities. Arrow length indicates strength. Gradient fills show field intensity. Equilibrium points marked where forces balance. Flowing variable lines. Green (#276749) for attraction forces, amber (#D69E2E) for repulsion. Soft ambient lighting. Natural perspective.

visualization_approach: Wave interference pattern showing state resonance
geometric_elements: wave forms, interference patterns, resonance peaks, phase markers
common_errors: Depicting as static rather than dynamic; missing phase relationships; treating resonance as binary
exemplar_prompt: Resonance visualization in Organic School style. Overlapping wave forms representing state similarities. Interference patterns show resonance (constructive) and dissonance (destructive). Variable flowing lines. Teal (#319795) and green (#276749) for different state waves. Warm gradient background. Soft directional lighting showing wave depth.

geometric_elements: exponential curve, time axis, memory markers, reactivation pulses
common_errors: Linear representation of exponential process; missing reactivation mechanism; treating all memories equally
exemplar_prompt: Ghost persistence in Notation Scribes style. Central exponential decay curve showing memory/haunting fade. Time axis horizontal, intensity vertical. Spike markers for reactivation events that reset decay. Clean precise lines. Black (#1A202C) for main curve, blue (#2B6CB0) for reactivation spikes, red (#C53030) for critical threshold. White background. Integrated equation: I(t) = I_0 * e^(-λt).

geometric_elements: gradient arrows, contour lines, path trajectory, destination marker
common_errors: Showing direct paths rather than gradient following; missing the destination paradox visualization
exemplar_prompt: Navigation resonance in Cartographic Guild style. Gradient field flowing toward destination attractor. Contour lines show 'distance' in resonance space. Traveler path follows gradient descent. Destination marked as basin minimum. Thin contour lines, medium boundaries. Blue (#2C5282) low resonance to red (#C53030) high. Parchment background. Scale indicator and legend.

geometric_elements: agent nodes, trust edges (weighted), negotiation links, collective boundary
common_errors: Treating agents as homogeneous; missing trust asymmetry; static rather than negotiating
exemplar_prompt: Federation network in Organic-Notation hybrid style. Agent nodes with individual boundaries maintaining autonomy. Trust edges with variable weight indicating relationship strength. Collective intelligence emerges at center. Flowing organic layout with precise labels. Green (#276749) for high trust, amber (#D69E2E) for moderate. Soft gradient background.

geometric_elements: branching structure, domain labels, failure type markers, severity gradient
common_errors: Treating failures as discrete categories; missing interconnection between domains; oversimplifying severity
exemplar_prompt: Failure taxonomy in Notation Scribes style. Six-domain classification tree. Main trunk branches to: Integration, Boundary, Memory, Navigation, Recognition, Federation failures. Sub-branches show specific failure types. Jackson marked as cross-domain anomaly. Clean precise lines. Black (#1A202C) structure, red (#C53030) for severe failures, green (#276749) for recoverable. White background with domain labels.

geometric_elements: temporal axis, agential axis, abstractive axis, integrative axis, horizon boundary
common_errors: Collapsing dimensions; missing the 'care folds time' insight; treating horizons as fixed rather than expandable
exemplar_prompt: Cognitive horizons in Geometric-Cartographic hybrid style. Four-axis projection: temporal depth (vertical), agential range (horizontal), abstractive height (diagonal up), integrative span (diagonal out). Horizon boundary as curved surface limiting cognition. Clean geometric lines with terrain-like shading. Slate (#1A202C) axes, blue (#2C5282) horizon surface. White background.

geometric_elements: concentric circles (levels), integration markers, example entities at each level
common_errors: Treating levels as discrete rather than continuous; missing transition zones; over-simplifying boundaries
exemplar_prompt: TAME levels in Geometric School style. Four concentric rings: T-Triggered (outer), A-Autonomous, M-Modular, E-Emergent (inner). Integration markers on ring boundaries. Example creatures/entities positioned at appropriate levels. Clean orthographic view. Uniform lines. Slate (#1A202C) rings, blue (#2B6CB0) integration zones. White background. Precise labels.

visualization_approach: Multiple overlapping perspectives on same substrate
geometric_elements: substrate representation, observer viewpoints, computation outputs, view boundaries
common_errors: Single observer assumption; missing polycomputing insight; static rather than observer-dependent
exemplar_prompt: Observer access in Organic-Notation hybrid style. Central substrate with multiple observer positions around it. Each observer 'sees' different computation. Overlapping view boundaries show shared vs unique access. Flowing arrangement with precise annotations. Teal (#319795) observer positions, green (#276749) substrate, amber (#D69E2E) computation outputs. Soft gradient background.

visualization_approach: Behavioral sequence notation with prime cycles
geometric_elements: sequence bars, prime markers (2,3,5,7,11), behavioral 'words', sentence structure
common_errors: Treating behavior as random; missing prime-number patterns; oversimplifying vocabulary
exemplar_prompt: Creature grammar in Notation Scribes style. Horizontal timeline showing behavioral sequences. Prime-cycle markers (2,3,5,7,11) annotate recurring patterns. 'Words' as behavioral units, 'sentences' as complete sequences. Clean notation-style layout. Black (#1A202C) timeline, blue (#2B6CB0) prime markers, green (#276749) for confirmed patterns. White background. Integrated frequency notation.

geometric_elements: two axes (stability/plasticity), trade-off curve, vigilance slider, operating points
common_errors: Treating as binary choice; missing continuous vigilance parameter; static representation
exemplar_prompt: Stability-plasticity in Geometric School style. Two-axis diagram: stability (vertical), plasticity (horizontal). Trade-off curve showing impossibility of maximizing both. Vigilance parameter as slider along curve. Operating points marked for different systems. Clean geometric construction. Slate (#1A202C) axes, red (#C53030) trade-off curve, blue (#2B6CB0) operating points. White background.

geometric_elements: eigenvalue spectrum, projected points, neighbor relationships, frequency bands
common_errors: Missing frequency interpretation; treating as simple dimensionality reduction; ignoring signed relationships
exemplar_prompt: Harmonic projection in Organic-Notation hybrid style. Entities projected into spectral space based on neighbor relationships. K-nearest and K-farthest relationships shown. Frequency bands indicated by color zones. Flowing point distribution with precise eigenvalue labels. Teal (#319795) KNN connections, amber (#D69E2E) KFN repulsion. Soft gradient background.

geometric_elements: two-panel: unstable region (before), stabilized region (after), observation event marker
common_errors: Missing temporal aspect; treating observation as instantaneous; ignoring partial stabilization
exemplar_prompt: Prebel Effect in Geometric School style. Two-panel comparison. Left: unstable region with fluctuating boundaries. Right: same region post-observation with stable contours. Central observation event marker. Clean uniform lines. Unstable (#C53030), stable (#2B6CB0), observation marker (#276749). White background. Labels: 'Pre-observation' and 'Post-observation'.

visualization_approach: Directional rose with three cardinal directions
geometric_elements: three arrows (no East), angular divisions, orientation labels
common_errors: Adding a fourth direction; using standard NSEW conventions; treating as artistic choice rather than cosmological fact
exemplar_prompt: Three-Compassed orientation in Cartographer's Guild style. Compass rose with only three directions (North, South, West). 120-degree angular divisions. No East marker - conspicuously absent. Survey-grade precision. Medium lines. Blue (#2C5282) primary rose, gold (#ECC94B) accents. Parchment background. Observer notation space below.

geometric_elements: trajectory paths, cluster boundaries, archetype labels, counter-examples
common_errors: Over-determining categories; missing individual variation; treating archetypes as prescriptive
exemplar_prompt: Journey archetypes in Cartographic Guild style. Four trajectory regions: Lucky Fool, Weathered Hand, Doomed Optimist, Happy Accident. Individual paths shown crossing regions. Cluster boundaries as terrain features. Counter-examples (Meck Drune critique) marked. Contour style. Blue (#2C5282) to red (#C53030) gradient for outcome quality. Parchment background.

geometric_elements: abstract forms (top), manifestation arrows, material instances (bottom), ingression pathway
common_errors: Static representation of dynamic process; missing the 'how' of manifestation; treating forms as templates rather than attractors
exemplar_prompt: Ingression in Organic School style. Upper region: abstract Form Library forms as soft shapes. Lower region: material instances as concrete creatures/entities. Ingression arrows showing manifestation pathway. Variable flowing lines show process dynamism. Green (#276749) abstract forms, teal (#319795) transitions, amber (#D69E2E) material instances. Warm gradient background.

visualization_approach: Symbol reference chart with combination rules
geometric_elements: symbol grid, meaning annotations, combination examples, counter values
common_errors: Treating symbols in isolation; missing combination semantics; ignoring counter values
exemplar_prompt: CSQ notation in Notation Scribes style. Grid layout of fundamental symbols (∅,∂,∫,Δ,Σ,Π,∇). Each symbol with meaning, counter value, position rules. Combination examples in sidebar. Clean publication layout. Black (#1A202C) symbols, blue (#2B6CB0) annotations, green (#276749) for examples. White background. LaTeX-quality rendering.

geometric_elements: time axis, basin boundary curves, expansion/contraction phases, cycle markers
common_errors: Static snapshot instead of animation; missing cyclical nature; treating as random fluctuation
exemplar_prompt: Basin breathing in Organic School style. Temporal visualization of basin boundary oscillation. Time flows left to right. Basin boundaries shown as curves that expand (inhale) and contract (exhale). Cycle phase markers. Variable flowing lines. Teal (#319795) boundaries, amber (#D69E2E) expansion phases. Warm gradient background. Natural breathing rhythm aesthetic.

geometric_elements: five connected forms, identity linkages, shared attractor center, individual boundaries
common_errors: Treating bodies as separate; missing unified identity; oversimplifying the psychological danger
exemplar_prompt: Five-Body Form in Organic-Notation hybrid style. Five distinct body representations connected by identity linkages to shared center. Each body maintains individual boundary while sharing form. Central attractor pulls all bodies. Warning notation about observation danger. Flowing organic layout. Green (#276749) individual bodies, teal (#319795) identity links. Soft gradient with warning red (#C53030) border.

visualization_approach: Comparative visualization of continuous vs discrete transitions
geometric_elements: two panels: smooth gradient (Keth), sharp boundary (Prebel), debate markers
common_errors: Taking sides; missing synthesis possibility; treating as purely theoretical
exemplar_prompt: Breach debate in Geometric School style. Two-panel comparison. Left (Keth): smooth gradient transition between basins. Right (Prebel): sharp discrete breach line. Central debate zone showing both interpretations. Clean geometric construction. Slate (#1A202C) lines, blue (#2B6CB0) Keth model, red (#C53030) Prebel model. White background. Neutral presentation.

geometric_elements: known information (shaded), new information (highlighted), redundancy markers, bit counts
common_errors: Treating all numbers as information; missing redundancy concept; ignoring context dependency
exemplar_prompt: Kellam's Rule in Notation Scribes style. Two regions: 'What you knew' (shaded slate) and 'What you learned' (highlighted blue). Redundant numbers marked in red zone between. Bit count annotations. Clean publication quality. Slate (#1A202C) background info, blue (#2B6CB0) new info, red (#C53030) redundancy. White background. Quote: 'A number that restates what you knew is not information.'

geometric_elements: subject node, prediction arrow, awareness loop, breakdown point, Jackson example
common_errors: Linear causation assumption; missing self-reference paradox; treating as simple feedback
exemplar_prompt: Reflexive subjects in Organic-Notation hybrid style. Subject node with prediction arrow entering. Awareness loop showing subject knowing prediction. Breakdown point where model fails. Jackson marked as paradigmatic example. Flowing layout with precise annotations. Green (#276749) subject, teal (#319795) prediction, red (#C53030) breakdown. Soft gradient background.
